awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: An amphibious shark-like monster terrorizes an abandoned secret military base and the people who live on the island it is located on. A marine biologist, as well as several other people, try to stop it before it is too late...
